{"id":477179169,"lang":"java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1617699113,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/477179169/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make Array Equal","memory":"38.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minOperations(int n) {\n        int[] arr = new int[n];\n        \n        int count =0;\n        int tape = 0;\n        for (int i =0; i<arr.length; i++){\n            arr[i] = (2*i)+1;\n            count +=arr[i];\n        }\n        int avg = count/n;\n        for (int i =0; i<arr.length/2; i++){\n            tape = tape + avg -arr[i];\n            \n        }\n        return tape;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-array-equal"}
